Visions of Doom.name: Visions of Doom
Visions of Doom.flavor: You sing a secret note that seeks out your chosen enemy, wracking it with painful images of its coming demise.
Visions of Doom.target: One creature that has your deathmark
Visions of Doom.onHit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage. Until the end of your next turn, one ally within 10 squares of you gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the target.

Cloak of Sound.name: Cloak of Sound
Cloak of Sound.flavor: You shroud your form in dark whispers, hindering your quarryâ€™s ability to see you.
Cloak of Sound.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you are invisible to a creature that has your deathmark.

Inevitability of the Grave.name: Inevitability of the Grave
Inevitability of the Grave.flavor: You call out a series of deadly notes, each one bringing your foe closer to its ordained demise.
Inevitability of the Grave.target: One creature that has your deathmark
Inevitability of the Grave.onHit: 3d10 + Charisma modifier damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends). The target takes a -2 penalty to its saving throws against the ongoing damage.
Inevitability of the Grave.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends).
